### Welcome to the RAML API portal for the <a href="https://www.blogger.com" target="_blank"><img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," width="36px"> Blogger API</a>! 

This portal provides 
- a [RAML spec](#REF_TAG_ROOT_RAML) describing the Blogger API in a clear, human- and machine-readable format
- [documentation](#REF_TAG_API_REFERENCE) of the Blogger API auto-generated from the RAML spec
- the [documentation](#REF_TAG_API_REFERENCE) is live: you can make calls to the Blogger API from the documentation
- live, documented usecases for the Blogger API, provided as API notebooks, and exercising much of the Blogger API

_This portal is built on the Anypoint Platform for APIs, using RAML version 0.8._

_For more information about RAML, see [http://raml.org](http://raml.org)._

_The API notebooks are all executable! Hit "enter" in any code cell to execute it (and all cells before it that have not executed yet), or scroll to the bottom of the notebook and click "Play notebook". For more information, see [http://apinotebook.com](http://apinotebook.com)._

---
### Please note:

This portal and its contents are not affiliated with Blogger. They are, however, useful for working with, and learning about, the Blogger API.

The official developer API portal for Blogger at <a href="https://developers.google.com/blogger/docs/3.0/reference/index" target="_blank">https://developers.google.com/blogger/docs/3.0/reference/index</a>
